  • Method Details

    • addProduct

      public ShoppingItemLine addProduct(ShoppingCart shoppingCart, Product product, int quantity) throws OutOfStockException, NullPriceException, DisabledStateException
      Adds a product with specific quantity to a shopping cart Note: if the product is already in cart, the quantity will be added to the existing item line.
      Parameters:
      shoppingCart - the shopping cart
      product - the product
      quantity - the quantity
      Returns:
      ShoppingItemLine either the newly created one, or the one that was incremented (if already in cart)
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - when quantity <= 0, and when product or shoppingCart is null
      NullPriceEception - if a product's buy price is null
      DisabledStateException - if a product is disabled
      OutOfStockException
      NullPriceException

    • clearCart

      public void clearCart(ShoppingCart shoppingCart)
      Clear shopping cart.
      Parameters:
      shoppingCart - the shopping cart

    • remove

      public void remove(ShoppingCart shoppingCart, ShoppingItemLine itemLine)
      Removes an itemLine from the shopping cart.
      Parameters:
      shoppingCart - the shopping cart
      itemLine - the item line

    • updateQuantity

      public void updateQuantity(ShoppingItemLine itemLine, int quantity) throws OutOfStockException
      Update an item line's quantity
      Parameters:
      itemLine - the item line
      Throws:
      OutOfStockException
      IllegalArgumentException - when quantity <= 0

    • removeUnbuyableItems

      public List<ShoppingItemLine> removeUnbuyableItems(ShoppingCart shoppingCart)
      // Removes items that cannot be bought from cart and returns them. // Unbuyable means out of stock, disabled, or ones with no 'buy' price
      Parameters:
      shoppingCart - the shopping cart
      Returns:
      A list of removed ShoppingItemLine's

    • adjustQuantity

      public List<ShoppingItemLine> adjustQuantity(ShoppingCart shoppingCart)
      Sets item lines' quantity to available quantity if stock has less than the required item amount
      Parameters:
      shoppingCart - the shopping cart
      Returns:
      A list of removed ShoppingItemLine's
